servinfo.title: Motor not running – Operating sound of magnetic switch heard
servinfo.ptxt: Possible symptoms due to starting system trouble would be as follows:

item.ptxt: Starting motor does not run (or runs slowly)
Starting motor runs but fails to crank engine

servinfo.ptxt: Proper diagnosis must be made to determine exactly where the cause of each trouble lies in battery, wiring harness, (including starting motor switch), starting motor or engine.
Do not remove motor just because starting motor does not run. Check the following items and narrow down scope of possible causes.

s1.ptxt: Tightness of battery terminals (including ground cable connection on engine side) and starting motor terminals

condition.ptxt: Motor not running – Operating sound of magnetic switch heard

ps.ptxt: Battery voltage too low due to battery deterioration
Burnt main contact point, or poor contacting action of magnetic switch
Brushes are seating poorly or worn down
